name: No One Knows You Exist
description:
Try not to let anyone escape, no one knows you exist it would be a shame for them to tell someone. Your supposed to be dead yet you faked your death and now anyone who sees you must die. Have fun trying to get the best time and remember DO NOT LET THEM ESCAPE, YOU DON'T EXIST.

Controls:

Left Mouse(Hold): Pull out sword

Mouse: Aim sword

Left Shift: Dash

Right Mouse(Hold): Hang on to things

A and D: Move Left and Right

Space: Jump
